mapper.select: SELECT A.PK_QUSITION_SEQ AS pkQusitionSeq , A.TYPE AS type , A.LEVEL AS level , A.QUSITION AS questionName , A.SOLUTION AS solution , A.REGIST_ID AS registId , A.UPDATE_ID AS updateId , A.UPDATE_DT AS updateDt , B.PK_QUSITION_RESULT_SEQ AS pkQusitionResultSeq , B.PK_USER_SEQ AS pkUserSeq FROM AI_QUESTION A INNER JOIN AI_QUESTION_RESULT B ON A.PK_QUSITION_SEQ = B.PK_QUSITION_SEQ WHERE B.PK_USER_SEQ = #{pkUserSeq}
